'Pages' is the second studio album from the country music band Bering Strait. It
was released June 28, 2005 via Universal South Records (now Show Dog-Universal
Music). The album was produced by Carl Jackson, except for "From Ankara to
Izmir", which was produced by Jerry Douglas.
